name: Out of Body Mind Dance (A)
description: All original 3D modeled character designed and sculpted from scratch with Zbrush. Outfit created with Zbrush, skin and clothing textured with Substance Painter with new materials I created for this. Everything modeled and scene built with Cinema4d and Octane Engine. Manually building a lighting rig for this specific scene. Part of a 2 part NFT SERIES. The fax weâ€™re created with Adobe After Effects. Original sound design and score.
